pages.text: This cage hums with power. It rivals the ancient spawners themselves in its power, impressively. This cage's purpose is, of course, to $(thing)spawn mobs$(). For this, one will need a sufficiently empowered $(item)soul crystal$(), to tune the cage. The level of power on the soul crystal corresponds to the abilities of the soul cage it is given to.

pages.title: Tier 1
pages.text: The weakest soul crystal required to power a soul cage must have at least $(thing)64 souls$() within. The resultant cage will wait at least 300 ticks, and at most 1000 ticks, before spawning 3 entities, up to 5 meters away. You, or beings like you, must be within 16 meters of the cage for it to operate.

pages.title: Tier 2
pages.text: To achieve this tier, the soul crystal must have at least $(thing)128 souls$() inside. The resultant cage will wait at least 150 ticks, and at most 600 ticks, before spawning 5 entities, up to 7 meters away. You, or beings like you, must be within 24 meters of the cage for it to operate.

pages.title: Tier 3
pages.text: At least $(thing)256 souls$() must be within the soul crystal used for this tier. The resultant cage will wait at least 75 ticks, and at most 400 ticks, before spawning 7 entities, up to 9 meters away. You, or beings like you, must be within 32 meters of the cage for it to operate.

pages.title: Tier 4
pages.text: The most powerful tier requires a soul crystal with $(thing)512 souls$() inside. The resultant cage will wait at least 25 ticks, and at most 300 ticks, before spawning 9 entities, up to 11 meters away. No presence is required for it to operate. You can further disable it with redstone.
